name: @playwind/com.google.firebase.auth
author: Google LLC (https://firebase.google.com/docs/auth/unity/start)
description:
Easily sign-in and authenticate players.

Sign-in players using any identity provider with Firebase Authentication. It supports email and password, phone authentication, Facebook, Google, Twitter, and more. Out-of-the-box, you get a secure, end-to-end identity solution.
